name: Marttiini Hiking axe
lead: Split firewood with a Marttiini Axe.
description: Our axe series follow the example set by Marttiini knives.
We combined modern technology with traditional handicraft. The result is a family of three durable and reliable axes.
For materials, we chose quality carbon steel, beautiful ash wood and timeless leather.
The Marttiini Hiking Axe is the most lightweight in the series. It is easy to carry with during longer hikes. Blade: 300 g.
